metadata.title: CVE-2019-10742 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Axios up to and including 0.18.0 allows attackers to cause a denial ofservice (application crash) by continuing to accepting content aftermaxContentLength is exceeded.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-10742` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-axios - 0.19.0+dfsg-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-axios package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.19.0+dfsg-2').
